sentences: Jim Koplik is an American concert promoter who has produced shows by The Rolling Stones, Paul McCartney, Bruce Springsteen, Pearl Jam, REO Speedwagon, Madonna, Billy Joel and Elton John, among others.
Born in New Rochelle, New York, Koplik launched his career in the late 1960s when he was a student at Ohio State University and promoted a show for the band Steppenwolf.
Before that he had worked at Ohio State on the 1968 presidential campaign of Robert F. Kennedy.
In 1981 Koplik moved from Westchester County, New York to Stamford.
Jim Koplik (along with Shelly Finkel) were co-promoters of the Summer Jam at Watkins Glen in New York in July 1973.
